query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Dal centro al cerchio, e sì dal cerchio al centro 2 movesi l’acqua in un ritondo vaso, 3 secondo ch’è percosso fuori o dentro:
query.error: **English:** 1 From the center to the circumference, and likewise from the circumference to the center, 2 the water moves in a round vessel, 3 according to whether it is struck from outside or from within:
query.result: 1 Dari pusat ke keliling, dan begitu juga dari keliling ke pusat, 2 air bergerak dalam bejana bundar, 3 sesuai dengan apakah ia dipukul dari luar atau dari dalam:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 ne la mia mente fé sùbito caso 5 questo ch’io dico, sì come si tacque 6 la glorïosa vita di Tommaso,
query.error: **English:** 4 in my mind this that I say suddenly occurred, 5 as soon as the glorious life of Thomas fell silent, 6 because of the similarity that arose
query.result: 4 dalam pikiranku hal yang kukatakan ini tiba-tiba terjadi, 5 segera setelah kehidupan Thomas yang mulia terdiam, 6 karena kesamaan yang muncul

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 per la similitudine che nacque 8 del suo parlare e di quel di Beatrice, 9 a cui sì cominciar, dopo lui, piacque:

query.result: 7 antara ucapannya dan ucapan Beatrice, 8 yang kepadanya berkenan untuk memulai, setelah dia, demikian: 9 "Orang ini membutuhkan, dan dia tidak memberitahumu

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 «A costui fa mestieri, e nol vi dice 11 né con la voce né pensando ancora, 12 d’un altro vero andare a la radice.
query.error: **English:** 10 "This man has need, and he does not tell you 11 either with his voice or yet by thinking, 12 to go to the root of another truth.
query.result: 10 "Orang ini membutuhkan, dan dia tidak memberitahumu 11 baik dengan suaranya maupun dengan berpikir, 12 untuk pergi ke akar kebenaran yang lain.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 13 Tell me if the light in which your substance blossoms 14 will remain with you eternally as it is now; 15 and if it remains, tell me how, after

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 e se rimane, dite come, poi 17 che sarete visibili rifatti, 18 esser porà ch’al veder non vi nòi».
query.error: **English:** 16 And if he remains, tell me how, then, 17 that you will be made visible again, 18 it may be possible that you will not harm him to see you.
query.result: 16 Dan jika dia tetap tinggal, katakan padaku bagaimana, kemudian, 17 bahwa kamu akan terlihat dibuat kembali, 18 mungkin saja kamu tidak akan menyakitinya untuk melihatmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 19 As those who are drawn and painted with greater joy, 20 at the feast, those who go in procession 21 raise their voices and gladden their actions,
query.result: 19 Seperti mereka yang ditarik dan dilukis dengan lebih banyak kegembiraan, 20 pada pesta, mereka yang berarak 21 meninggikan suara mereka dan menggembirakan tindakan mereka,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 così, a l’orazion pronta e divota, 23 li santi cerchi mostrar nova gioia 24 nel torneare e ne la mira nota.
query.error: **English:** 22 so, at the ready and devout prayer, 23 the holy circles showed new joy 24 in the circling and in the wonderful melody.
query.result: 22 begitu juga, pada doa yang siap dan khusyuk, 23 lingkaran-lingkaran suci menunjukkan kegembiraan baru 24 dalam perputaran dan dalam melodi yang indah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Qual si lamenta perché qui si moia 26 per viver colà sù, non vide quive 27 lo refrigerio de l’etterna ploia.
query.error: **English:** 25 Who laments because he is here 26 to live up there, did not see here 27 the refreshment of the eternal rain.
query.result: 25 Yang meratap karena dia ada di sini 26 untuk hidup di sana, tidak melihat di sini 27 kesejukan hujan abadi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Quell’ uno e due e tre che sempre vive 29 e regna sempre in tre e ’n due e ’n uno, 30 non circunscritto, e tutto circunscrive,
query.error: **English:** 28 That one and two and three who always lives 29 and always reigns in three and two and one, 30 not circumscribed, and circumscribes all,
query.result: 28 Yang satu dan dua dan tiga yang selalu hidup 29 dan selalu memerintah dalam tiga dan dua dan satu, 30 tidak terbatas, dan membatasi semua,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 tre volte era cantato da ciascuno 32 di quelli spirti con tal melodia, 33 ch’ad ogne merto saria giusto muno.
query.error: **English:** 31 was sung three times by each 32 of those spirits with such melody, 33 that to each merit it gave just reward.
query.result: 31 dinyanyikan tiga kali oleh masing-masing 32 roh-roh itu dengan melodi sedemikian rupa, 33 sehingga untuk setiap kebaikan diberikan upah yang adil.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 34 Dan aku mendengar dalam cahaya yang lebih terang 35 dari bulatan yang lebih kecil suara yang sederhana, 36 mungkin seperti suara malaikat kepada Maria,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 37 menjawab: "Sepanjang pesta 38 surga akan berlangsung, begitu lama cinta kita 39 akan bersinar di sekeliling pakaian ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 40 Its brightness follows its ardor; 41 the ardor, the vision; and that is as great 42 as the grace that exceeds its worth.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
